ziyaret = 0 arama = 0 email = 0 rutin_ziyaret = 0 dijital_ziyaret = 0 for r in record.x_studio_field_Yx0X5: if r.x_studio_field_bFy5v.x_studio_field_woWgL == 'Ziyaret': ziyaret = ziyaret + 1 if r.x_studio_field_bFy5v.x_studio_field_woWgL == 'Arama': arama = arama + 1 if r.x_studio_field_bFy5v.x_studio_field_woWgL == 'E-Mail': email = email + 1
if r.x_studio_field_4b0YS.id == 1: rutin_ziyaret += 1 elif r.x_studio_field_4b0YS.id == 2: dijital_ziyaret += 1
record.update({"x_studio_field_zlYiP": ziyaret}) record.update({"x_studio_field_5kv6v": arama}) record.update({"x_studio_field_g6P6h": email}) record.update({"x_studio_field_GYgWG": rutin_ziyaret}) record.update({"x_studio_field_nALhZ": dijital_ziyaret})
